body_html:
There was mentioned a lot ...:, ...:, ...:
ASUS plx chip and bios related issue.
Kernel parameter pci=nommconf has fixed everything.
iommu off - should as well but as a last measure.
body_text:
There was mentioned a lot ...:, ...:, ...:
ASUS plx chip and bios related issue.
Kernel parameter pci=nommconf has fixed everything.
iommu off - should as well but as a last measure.
body:
There was mentioned a lot [...:](https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/994904/linux/peer-to-peer-dma-transfers-bug-under-intel-vt-d-iommu-virtualization-/), [...:](https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=230362), [...:](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42767187/why-does-this-tensorflow-code-crash)
 ASUS plx chip and bios related issue.
Kernel parameter pci=nommconf has fixed everything.
iommu off - should as well but as a last measure.
